item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, January 25, 2025 at 2:35 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump in fiery call with Denmark’s prime minister over Greenland
2. [Opinion] Gen Z Americans are leaving their European cousins in the dust
3. London mansion sold for £139mn to mystery buyer
4. Marco Rubio demands immediate halt to virtually all US foreign aid
5. Wall Street will stymie Trump’s US oil surge plan, say shale bosses
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, January 25, 2025 at 2:35 AM UTC
